sentence.Network_en: She coveted his job so openly that conversations between them were tense.
sentence.Network_cn: 她毫不隐讳地表示想得到他的工作，以至于他们之间说话都带着火药味。

sentence.Network_en: He had long coveted the chance to work with a famous musician.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直渴望有机会与著名音乐家一起工作。

sentence.Network_en: Ther other boys coveted his new bat.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他的男孩都想得到他的新球棒.

entry.def: You use coveted to describe something that very many people would like to have.

example.ex: Allan Little from Radio 4 took the coveted title of reporter of the year.
example.tran: 第四广播台的艾伦·利特尔获得了人人梦寐以求的年度记者称号。
体育界最令人垂涎的一个奖杯
